Abstract: The world’s most successful single-session charity bridge tournament, the UJA-Federation of New York’s Women’s Philanthropy pro-am, was played on Tuesday at the Harmonie Club in Manhattan.
Snippet: The world’s most successful single-session charity bridge tournament, the UJA-Federation of New York’s Women’s Philanthropy pro-am, was played on Tuesday at the Harmonie Club in Manhattan.
LeadParagraph: The world’s most successful single-session charity bridge tournament, the UJA-Federation of New York’s Women’s Philanthropy pro-am, was played on Tuesday at the Harmonie Club in Manhattan. Organized by Marci Miron, Nancy Brown, Jennifer Hoine and Jacqui Weidman, the 49th such event raised over $115,000.

Headline.Main: In Bridge, UJA-Federation of New York’s Women’s Philanthropy
